question: Which of the following is an example of asexual reproduction?
candidate_answers: (A) Turtles lay fertilized eggs in a pit in the sand. (B) Seeds form in pine cones after pollen reaches the cones. (C) Fish release egg cells and sperm cells at the surface of the water. (D) Trees send out rootlike extensions that produce new stems.
answer: Trees send out rootlike extensions that produce new stems.
label: D
